content:
Please note that tomorrow's weekly meeting has been postponed one week. But please remember that next week we are again on the "Western" edition timeframe: meeting Thursday, February 17, 6p EASTERN.

Meeting Link
Meeting ID: 956 6739 7084
Passcode: 710256

In addition to our normal updates, next week we have invited Dr. Shahim Essaid from the University of Colorado to present his findings harmonizing patient encounters between FHIR and OMOP Encounter. See you all then
Unfortunately, I'll be OOO next but will review the meeting minutes. Thanks
